text: @maggieNYT Let's see the data, @jaredkushner. This Admin. is all "Trust us, we know what we're doing." And time and again, it fails. You, Trump, et al. never present actual fact-checked data. Put up or shut up. Make us trust you because now, I wouldn't trust you with anything. #COVID19
